definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: †II. [[[מוּשׁ]]] vb. feel (NH id.; Aram. me4, [[מוּשׁ]] id.; secondary form of [[משׁשׁ]] q. v.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. sf. [[וַאֲמֻֽשְְׁ]] Ge 27:21 draw near that I may feel thee.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וְלאׁ יִמִישׁוּן יְדֵיהֶם]] Ps 115:7 as for their hands, they do not feel (of idols; ‖[[דַגְלֵיהֶם וְלאׁ יְהַלָּבוּ]]); Imv. sf. [[וַהֲמִישֵׁנִי]] Ju Jdg 16:26 Qr (Kt [[והימשׁני]], v. [[ימשׁ]]), but rd. [[וַהֲּמִשֵּׁנִי]], v. [[משׁשׁ]].
